Package visualisation

Class ViewerSlice

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualisation.ViewerSlice
  • public class ViewerSlice
extends Object
    Slice for a specific game round for aggregating and storing round specific information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewerSlice

        public ViewerSlice​(int playerId,
                   int round,
                   double availableTime,
                   utility.game.player.PlayerAction performedAction,
                   double requiredTime)
        Generates a new viewer slice with round specific information.
        Parameters:
        playerId - the id of the player who owns the window
        round - the round index the viewer slice is valid for
        availableTime - the available time in seconds
        performedAction - the PlayerAction chosen by the player for the given round
        requiredTime - the required time in seconds

    • Method Detail

      • getRound

        public int getRound()
        Returns:
        the round the viewer slice is valid for

      • getAvailableTime

        public double getAvailableTime()
        Returns:
        the available time in seconds

      • getPerformedAction

        public utility.game.player.PlayerAction getPerformedAction()
        Returns:
        the PlayerAction performed by the player

      • getRequiredTime

        public double getRequiredTime()
        Returns:
        the actual time the player needed to calculate his action

      • getPlayerRgbColor

        public int getPlayerRgbColor()
        Returns:
        Get the Color of the players "snake"

      • addImage

        public void addImage​(NamedImage image)
        Adds an image to the current ViewerSlice.
        Parameters:
        image - NamedImage to add to the ViewerSlice

      • getImages

        public List<NamedImage> getImages()
        Returns:
        the images aggregated for the given round
